pages.title: Soul's Blessing
pages.text: While The Soul's Blessing Effect Is Applied, You Cannot Have The Devilish Bargain Effect At The Same Time. You Also Feel Extremely Lucky Due To The Spirits' Blessing

pages.title: Applying Soul's Blessing
pages.text: You Can Apply Soul's Blessing By Right-Clicking A Totem Of Salvation With A Soul Fire Shard In Your Offhand.
